name: Pixie Pouch
description:
****PATTERN ONLY, NOT THE FINISHED PRODUCT!****

Perfect for all the small things in life...


This is a PDF pattern file for my Pixie Pouch Mini Tote Bag.

The finished bag (not including the strap) measures approximately 7.5 inches in diameter and 6 inches high.
